name: SHEE ATIKA, INCORPORATED
description: Urban corporation organized  pursuant to the Alaska Native Claims Settlement Act
sampleDescriptions: Tax issues relating to the treatment of Alaska Native Settlement Trusts.
Lobbying for potential development of deep water port and facility for use by U.S. Department of Defense.
Work related to seeking authorization appropriations legislation in the United States Congress to facilitate disposition of Shee Atkia Inc.'s lands at Cube Cove.
Tax issues relating to the treatment of Alaska Native Settlement Trusts.
Lobbying for potential development of deep water port and facility for use by U.S. Department of Defense.
